column1: Chinese FDI Flow to African Countries
Author: Johns Hopkins Univeristy SAIS China-Africa Research Initiative
Title: Chinese FDI Flow to African Countries

Sources: The Statistical Bulletin of China's Outward Foreign Direct Investment published by China's MOFCOM. It is usually updated in September or October of the year, http://fec.mofcom.gov.cn/article/tjsj/. The 2020 data is obtained from MOFCOM via the CEIC database.
